description.en:
Bmining is a DeFi mining protocol

Bmining protocol consists of bBTC50 tokens, bETH30 tokens and BMT tokens. Each bBTC50 token represents 1TH/s hashrate with pre-determined power ratio, Each bETH30 token represents 5MH/s hashrate with pre-determined power ratio, mining rigs would be in mining pools during life cycle. While net profit on wBTC or ETH would be distributed per minutes.
